r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: This is the first stable release of Cache_Lite. There is no big change since the 0.4 beta release but two months of tests ! Changes : - fix magic_q issue (Thanks to Moshe Doron)
